title: In Bloom
description: Hoodies are vandalizing the once sleepy village of Elderfield, set in the heart of rural England, as Ruth mourns the loss of her husband. While she and her friends try to bring both sides of the town together through gardening, she meets Rob and wonders if there could be love and happiness for her again. However, he has a ghost of his own to come to terms with first.
author: Sophie Chalmers
